Question
========

If I perform 2 independent draws X~1~ and X~2~ from the same distribution (with variance = 5), then for the variances of 2X~1~ and X~1~ + X~2~:

Answerlist
----------

* Var(2X1) < var(X1 + X2)
* Var(2X1) = var(X1 + X2)
* Var(2X1) > var(X1 + X2)
* Var(2X1) and var(X1 + X2) are not comparable

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Var(2X1) < var(X1 + X2): Incorrect
* Var(2X1) = var(X1 + X2): Incorrect
* Var(2X1) > var(X1 + X2): Correct
* Var(2X1) and var(X1 + X2) are not comparable: Incorrect
